sentences.english: A challenge is nothing but an opportunity turned upside down.

sentences.english: By employing the seemingly miraculous backhand painting technique, the art compacts the universe into a small space.

sentences.chinese: 其實小小的轉變就可以扭轉乾坤。

sentences.english: He thinks that he can beat me at tennis, but I have an ace up my sleeve.
sentences.chinese: 他以爲他打網球能贏我，豈不知我還有袖裏乾坤。
